sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import {auth} from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import {ReactComponent as Logo} from '../../assets/crown.svg' import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/cart-icon.component' import CartDropdown from '../cart-dropdown/cart-dropdown.component' import {selectCartHidden} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import {selectCurrentUser} from '../../redux/user/user.selectors' import './header.styles.scss' const Header = ({currentUser, hidden}) => (
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
): (SIGN IN) }
{ hidden ? null : ()}
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ currentUser: selectCurrentUser, hidden: selectCartHidden }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header);
